--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "Yes, and it is ussually good strategy to have proper 
fortifications.
> Something we do not have." He turned his attention to Astrotrain.
> "Astrotrain, you will lead an outing party to the Azores Islands, 
where
> the Predacons landed their ship, and retrieve it. Contact me once 
you
> have." he ordered.

::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Domnijoe sat back and watched the spectacle before her. When 
Astrotrain went to speak to Megatron, she poked Wildrider in the side.
    "Sooo...do I sit here and look stupid or are you guys gonna say 
something?" she said. "I ain't aiming to be squashed by big bot by 
interupting him." She eyed Blindchaos and snorted at him. He'd 
instictively followed Astrotrain a few steps, but returned to 
Domnijoe's side when he caught himself.
    "Sorry about that." he said. He dug his foot in the dirt, 
appologetic, like a school kid. It made Domnijoe groan with disgust. 
Blindchaos looked up at Megatron for a momment, then winked at his 
female companion.
    "You are right." he said, teasingly. "Meggy **IS** cute."
    Domnijoe's soul response was a good hard boot to the triple 
changer's gut with her elbow. It sent Blindchaos giggling.


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

***************
